actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the deduction as medical expenses of the full cost of permanent improvements to property made for medical care purposes.

summary.text: Handicapped Medical Expense Exemption Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals to treat amounts paid for permanent improvements to property for medical care purposes as deductible medical expenses without reducing the deduction for any increase in the value of the property.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit the deduction as medical expenses of the full cost of permanent improvements to property made for medical care purposes.
